channel.title: If you won a million dollars

item.title: If you won a million dollars
item.dc:creator: @Mendorphins Mendorphins
item.description:
@Mendorphins wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:89, topic:368669”][quote author=Canownueazy link=topic=464809.msg3398852#msg3398852 date=1289718714]
What would you do if you won a million dollars?

Transfer it into pounds.

Then buy a house with a field for banger racing and quad bikes and then live a comfortable lifestyle for a while (as long as possible). :D[/quote]

$1,000,000 = £628,219.62

Yeah but America has 25 Cents, whereas we only have the 20p, therefore you spend more in Dollars than you do Pounds.

Then again, 25 Cents is most likely equivalent to about 10p… Well, hypothectically I won it, so who cares. Still a free 600k. Can’t exactly spend my Dollar in England.

Read full topic
item.source: If you won a million dollars

What would you do if you won a million dollars?

Transfer it into pounds.

Then buy a house with a field for banger racing and quad bikes and then live a comfortable lifestyle for a while (as long as possible).
[/quote]

$1,000,000 = £628,219.62[/quote]

[/quote]

Then buy a house with a field for banger racing and quad bikes and then live a comfortable lifestyle for a while (as long as possible). :D[/quote]

[quote=“krackkid, post:88, topic:368669”][quote author=ollie123 link=topic=464809.msg3401946#msg3401946 date=1290020529]
I would donate half of it to stopping cancer
[/quote]Don’t you mean to help cure cancer o.o, I don’t think they will be able to ever stop it from happening.[/quote]
